data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Souk Ahras, Algeria.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Souk Ahras, Algeria
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Souk Ahras you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Souk Ahras, Algeria.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 156,800 souls in Souk Ahras and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bedouin, Chaamba people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 107 believers in Souk Ahras, Algeria a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Souk Ahras, Algeria not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Souk Ahras, Algeria has a population of 156,800.

We estimate Souk Ahras has 107 people who might know Jesus, 13 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 156,680 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,465 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Souk Ahras.
